16.1.hd_quote: The tendency to express fantasy as fact.
16.1.behavioral_axis: Daydreams skills and configurations without motor access, identifying with talent through mental patterns rather than manifestation.
16.1.shadow_axis: Publicly communicates fantasy as proven fact, declaring skills that cannot manifest without sustained energy connection.
16.1.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

16.2.hd_quote: Self-reliance and the skill to judge objectively any claim regardless of rhetoric.
16.2.behavioral_axis: Called out by others seeking skills, naturally bursts bubbles by assessing whose energy can actually manifest the claim.
16.2.shadow_axis: Compulsively bursts bubbles about own and others' talent, remaining uncertain of personal depth through never accessing motor energy.
16.2.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

16.3.hd_quote: The proper timing to maintain rhythm and avoid deflation.
16.3.behavioral_axis: Experiments through trial-and-error to learn which people bring the right energy to manifest skills at proper timing.
16.3.shadow_axis: Forces skills without waiting for energy, becoming frustrated and dependent on others to regenerate enthusiasm.
16.3.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

16.4.hd_quote: The skill to recognize and support the talents of others.
16.4.behavioral_axis: Externalizes by identifying who has energy in the network, supporting and preparing others so collective talent manifests.
16.4.shadow_axis: Refuses to support others' talents, becoming a demagogue who controls rather than enables collective manifestation.
16.4.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

16.5.hd_quote: The lack of confidence in the expression of skills that needs the encouragement of others.
16.5.behavioral_axis: Holds the projection field of having skills, waiting until others repeatedly encourage them before committing talent to manifestation.
16.5.shadow_axis: Refuses to share skills with others, believing that giving talent away hampers personal development when lacking confidence.
16.5.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

16.6.hd_quote: The ability to experience, examine and then reject misleading enthusiasm.
16.6.behavioral_axis: Develops objectivity through examining many techniques, withholding commitment until finding which skills can manifest perfection.
16.6.shadow_axis: Becomes a disinterested critic of others' techniques, painfully withdrawing when the ideal skill remains unseen and unproven.
16.6.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks
